title: Almyras
description: A copper smelting site located near the modern town of Agia Varvara in Cyprus. The site contains remains dated to the Iron Age.

properties.description: Point representing the location of the remains at Agia Varvara-Almyras, derived from an OpenStreetMap node after Peege 2018
properties.title: OSM location of Agia Varvara-Almyras
